English: Hmm? Yanne? What are you doing here?
Preparing a surprise party!\nThis place is going to be crowded this evening.
Eh? Is today a special day?
Yep. It’s Gau's birthday.
What... Today's Uncle Gau's birthday?!
He mentioned it briefly while drinking.
To think that I actually asked him to go on a raspberry hunt with me today...
Hmm... Do you think he was upset because I didn’t know it was his birthday?
Did Gau seem like he was having a bad day?
Yes, he didn’t say much when I talked to him. Also, he looked quite depressed all morning.
It must be guilt.
Pardon? How can someone feel guilty on a birthday?
He told me before that he once went on a rampage during his birthday. His fellow Barbarians got hurt quite badly.
I guess those memories keep haunting him.
Seriously? That gentle bear of a man did that?!
He’s so soft that he even refuses to touch a sparrow!
Oh, right. You wouldn’t know of Gau’s past.
Although he looks like a hairy man with a gentle spirit now,
he was once infamously known as the fiercest warrior in all of the Barbarian Kingdom.
Whaaat?! No way!
I remember hearing about Gau's exploits when I was young.
Whenever the Barbarian with dual axes walked by, all the villagers would shut their doors, locking themselves up tight.
Unbelievable... No way.
So the reason he built an orphanage... That's...
Perhaps... He desperately wanted to fix his past wrongdoings by doing something good.
Gau... For all this time, I had thought that he’s just a cool, easy-going person...
I didn't realize he carried such a burden...
I wish he would let some of his burdens go.
He's already putting in so much effort, trying to rebuild the fallen Barbarian Kingdom.
I know that some people still think of Gau as the nasty person from before,
but you know him, Rodina.
He's a kindhearted person.
Of course!
Uncle Gau has such a warm heart. In fact, his heart is so warm that I’m sure it could melt the very snow covering the mountains!
Ahaha, well said. Anyways, so I invited some special guests for the surprise party!
Unfortunately, I wasn't able to invite Kasel and his friends since they're so far away.
But that shouldn't keep us from throwing an amazing party this evening! Let’s go get ready!
Roger that! Is there anything I can do to help?
Well, since I prepared all the meat and booze already,
can you head outside and pick those raspberries that Gau likes?
Got it! I'll head out and pick all the snow mountain raspberries for him!
Then I’m going to ask Pavel to make us a delicious ice raspberry cake!
Great plan!
Um... Actually...
Will Gau come here for the cake?
Oh, don’t you worry about that!\nI already got the only person who can control Gau on board!
Was I too cold to Rodina?
*Sigh* But I’m just not in a mood to do anything.
Why did I do something so horrible back then when I was young?
Even on my birthdays...
It gives me no right to hurt the people who are dear to me...
That red light...
Gau, why are you here throwing a pity party all by yourself on your birthday?
L- Lei?
What brings you here?
Being depressed won't change the past.
What’s most important is the present. This moment you are now living in, Gau.
Are you just going waste away your precious time on an unpleasant memory?
B-but... I’m...
Allow me to show you what kind of life you are living now.
Close your eyes, hold my hand, and follow me slowly.
Huh? T-this is so sudden...
L- Lei? Where are you leading me to?
Open your eyes now.
Gau! Happy birthday!
Happy birthday, Uncle Gau!
I made you a raspberry cake! You are going to love this!
I will make you an ice harmonica that never melts, Barbarian.
Hahaha! You can't expect me to miss out on your birthday!
Besides, snow mountain beers here are the best!
Ah...
They all came to celebrate your birthday, Gau.
This is your life. You are a welcomed, appreciated person, Gau.
I... I... T-this...
means so much to me. Thank you all...
Oh, we're not done yet, heh.
I haven't even revealed my present yet.
Huh?
I prepared something special just for you, Gau.
Happy birthday, from the bottom of my heart.
Uncle Gau!!!
Y-you guys! Irin!
Looks like this party was a huge success.
I wish you a great birthday, Your Highness.
The cheering from the crowd of the afternoon parade was deafening.
Haha, the people of Orvelia love Her Highness.
I heard even a child dedicated a garland to Her Highness.
Her Highness should wear an item that fits her royal standing, not a bunch of dirty shrubs.
I’ve actually prepared something for her-
That would be enough. You are all too much.
Your Highness.
Everyone is waiting for you.
I will take my leave then. Have a pleasant day, gentlemen.
You look troubled, Your Highness.
...Do I? I must've made you worry.
I find myself repeating this every year, but today is your birthday, Your Highness.
Please lay down your worries and enjoy this day.
...Thank you. I will try.
...Your Highness, may I venture out to find Chase and Clause?
It should not take this long to collect firewood.
Very well, you may go.
Did you go all the way to Ogria for firewood?
? We did not go there.
Haha, our apologies, captain.
Chase suddenly disappeared during the task. We were late because it took me quite a long time to find him.
You are all... Never mind.
Go guard Her Highness.
Is there something wrong, captain?
Ever since morning, it seems that Her Highness is feeling down.
I assume she’s contemplating over the incident that took place at her birthday banquet 3 years ago.
I do not know about that.
Eh... Um... Are you referring to that incident when an assassin tried to assassinate His Majesty during Her Highness' royal birthday banquet
that lead to the exacerbation of His Majesty’s condition, captain?
No need to hush over it. He deserves to know.
We captured that assassin immediately on-site,
but no matter how hard we interrogated him, the assassin would only repeat that his client is Princess Scarlet.
(So the true culprit was not identified till the end.)
Every year, whenever Her Highness Princess Scarlet’s birthday approached, people would gossip about that incident.
Her Highness couldn't even relax and celebrate her birthday.
Those nobles... They flatter Her Highness in front, but they start gossiping as soon as they turn away. The very sight of it infuriates me...
Captain Demia...
I'm glad that she’s at least spending her birthday outside the royal palace this year.
...Looks like I went overboard and spoke too much.
Pretend you haven't heard any of this. Stay silent and guard Her Highness.
...Understood, captain.
Your Highness. I apologize for being late.
Be at ease. I was watching the lake while waiting.
Watching the silent lake calmed my mind. Time just flew by.
Your Highness...
Chase..?!
I heard today is your birthday.
(That insensitive fool! I told him over and over not to disturb Her Highness!)
Your birthday should be a happy day. You don't look happy.
That’s-
That’s why I will give you this.
This is... a garland.
Clause taught me how to make this. We made it together.
Demia is worried about the princess. Demia sad.
Princess must laugh. Only then others can all laugh.
Chase...
I apologize for making you all worry, and I also thank you all for what you’ve done.
The support from all of you... is the most precious thing to me.
I am glad that you are all on my side. I am relieved.
I'm delighted to see Her Highness smile this day.
However, I do not fully trust him yet...
Captain, although I understand your concern,
it wouldn’t hurt to compliment Chase for his achievement today.
I will if he successfully fulfills his duty of escorting Her Highness back.
In the very beginning, Goddess Lua created all life and bestowed each of them with unique traits.
Her creations shine brightly, burning through the flames called life.
However, they are weak, foolish beings who harm themselves and doubt their own capabilities to no end.
An Angel!
(What? My disguise was perfect! How did he recognize that I’m an Angel?)
Your wings... are like angel wings! They're so white and soft!
I saw guys and girls with wings before,
but I’ve never seen such white, pretty wings!
Ah... I see.
Anyway, human, what have you called me for?
Oh, I just called you because your wings looked pretty!
Hey! Don’t go just yet!
I actually have a favor to ask you!
I refuse.
Please! Just for a minute!
Today is my sister’s birthday! I want to give her a meaningful present!
What has that got to do with me?
Well, my sister always stays at home because she’s not well.
Since you look like an Angel, I thought she would feel better if
you could cheer her up by telling her that she'll get well soon...
And like I said, it’s her birthday today... It’s just more meaningful if that happens today.
What is so special about a birthday?
It’s just a day you were born.
Uh... Umm... I guess that’s true...
(What is this? Does he hate birthdays or something?)
Mom told me that a birthday is not just a day for celebration.
It's a day of welcoming you into this world!
Welcome?
Mom also said that when you are a baby, you always stay with your family,
but when you grow older, the world you see and feel gets bigger too.
So it can feel overwhelming and lonely to stand in this world on your own.
That’s why we celebrate birthdays! To show that we will stay together until the end!
You’ve never had that experience?
Like getting celebrated at your birthday party, or celebrating others?
The Goddess created us with a purpose. Having such emotions would be a sign of disloyalty.
Our duty is to judge and condemn evil, given by the Goddess herself.
We already have a strong conviction of the meaning of our existence. We do not need birthdays like you.
But even the other high priests celebrated birthdays...
They actually blessed our birthdays even more...
I think you're more strict than our priests.
They may follow the Goddess' will, but they are only humans.
You humans burn your own body in doubt and anxiety.
Your words are too hard to understand...
When is your birthday?
I awakened this same day.
Oh, then your birthday is the same as my sister!
Are you going to host a birthday party today too?
*Sigh*... I knew younger humans are foolish, but this...
I told you I don't need a birthday. Birthdays are for creatures like humans who always doubt-
What?! That means nobody ever wished you a happy birthday!
That’s not good!
Celebrating a birthday also means welcoming you to this world.
If no one welcomes you, even an adult like you will get lonely!
Stop...Let go of your hand at once, human!
Come with me to my home! Since today is also my sister’s birthday, we can celebrate yours as well!
I said I don’t need it!
Angels are beings created by Lua herself to realize her will.
We are Lua’s servants, created with a specific goal and purpose.
Our flame belongs to Goddess Lua, and her alone.
That is why we are not afraid of being thrown out in the world alone.
We also never feel lonely.
However, the warmth of the boy’s hand that day was...
Chrisha, here’s your birthday present.
Don't let this distract you from your work, however.
There’s nothing special or grand about birthdays.
Understood? You should never let your guard down and leave yourself unprepared.
Yes, father.
I will never forget that. I will not bring dishonor to our family’s name.
So, you were here after all.
Is something the matter?
I have not received report of any serious task that requires the two of you.
I heard today is your birthday, Commander Chrisha.
We have come to congratulate-
...Are you still working?
I am an Imperial Inquisitor and the captain of the Magic Knights.
I cannot allow myself to rest and neglect my duty for personal reasons. Birthday included.
*Sigh*
Fufufu. Rigid as a wooden plank. That’s the Chrisha I know.
But I’ve prepared a gift that would suit you nicely.
...I do not comprehend. And this is...
Commander Chrisha, for your devotion towards the empire,
His Majesty has rewarded a special vacation.
Which means! You don't have to- no, you are not allowed to work today!
Happy birthday, Chrisha.
Congratulations.
Thank you. You may leave now.
Huh?
Can't you see that I’m still attending to my duty? I have received His Majesty’s will. You may leave now.
Again, I expected this to happen.
Which is why I came prepared. I’m counting on you for this, Glenwys.
Yes, sir. Leave it to me.
(They seem to get along well... Anyhow, I wish they would stop being so noisy and just leave me alone.)
What are you doing?!
Forgive me for this, Commander Chrisha!
Thanks for everything, Sir Fluss!
Fufufu. Do not worry, and have fun!
*Sigh*
I demand an explanation. I'm nearly at my limit now.
Forgive me for my rude intrusion, Commander Chrisha... I sincerely apologize for disrupting your work.
To tell you the truth, for days, I have wondered what might be a good present for you.
Nothing came up to my mind, and that’s when Sir Fluss suggested me this...
*Sigh*... Very well.
You even have the direct order from His Majesty. It's not like I can run away.
It’s just that...
Yes?
I’ve never taken a day off or celebrated my birthday until now.
I just don’t know what I should do.
Goodness... What do you normally do during your break then?
A game of chess, reading books... My activities during break are all intellectually stimulating ones.
One should never waste her time at any given chance.
Hm... If that’s the case...
Commander Chrisha! Allow me to guide you through today.
Guide me? You?
Although I'm not sure if you would enjoy recreational activities of commoners,
today is a special day. I shall try my best to make this birthday a pleasant and fun day to remember.
*Sigh*... If you insist...
You may lead me, Glenwys.
Right away! Thank you for giving me the honor, Commander Chrisha.
That was greaaaat. Juno’s food is always the best!
You're welcome. No drinks today?
Nah, I'll pass. I have somewhere to go today.
It’s not like you to skip a drink... Is everything alright?
Yeah I’m fine, don’t worry. I’m a priest, after all. There are some days when I live by the rules.
Haha. I'll be leaving now. Until next time!
How would I know my birthday when I don't even know what my real name is?
I may have never had one, but I never wanted one.\nOr more like, I didn't have the time to realize I wanted one.
It wasn't until a long time had passed after father took me into the church
that I was able to catch my breath and think about more than just surviving.
About 12 years ago. Church of Lua.
Ah, you're here.
What are you looking at so closely?
There were priests singing
a hymn to celebrate a boy’s birthday in the dining hall.
I had never seen people sing a hymn instead of a birthday song,
so I was just sitting there listening.
Ah, a birthday party. Do you want to join them?
No. Why would I? I just find it strange that they are singing a hymn instead of a birthday song.
What my father was thinking at that time, I do not know.
Maybe he was pitying the boy
who’s never celebrated his own or the birthday of others.
But I had never wished for my birthday to be celebrated by others.
I didn't have a birthday to start with.
Even if I had a birthday, my father would be the only one who would celebrate it.
It would have been awkward with just the two of us
sitting down with a cake in between.
A week had passed since that day, and my father asked me to come out.
Back then I did not realize it,
but that day was when we had first met a year ago.
Hey, old man! Old maaan!
That’s not how you address your mentor!
What's the problem with calling an old man an old man? And where are we going anyways? It’s getting really dark here, you know.
For dinner, of course. You were always complaining about church meals being full of vegetables.
The restaurant was alright. The food was decent and plentiful.
We went for a long walk after the meal.
It was our time to talk to each other comfortably without having to be conscious of others.
That very day became the day we go out for dinner outside every year.
That is, for 10 years until he passed away.
Although that may seem like nothing to others, those dinners\nwe had outside were my special childhood memories.
Hey pops, it’s me.
Have you heard? That restaurant you used to take me to, the owner retired not too long ago. That restaurant is gone now.
That’s why I went to my favorite restaurant. That place is pretty good as well. You would've enjoyed it too.
Other than that, everything’s pretty much the same.
...Pops, you gave me and taught me a lot. Even more so than you think.
Thanks. It wasn't a bad choice after all, to follow you outside that day.
Ha, it's a success! Now I can get my birthday celebrated by Laias first!
How did I come up with such a brilliant idea of sleeping together for this? I feel like I’ve become smarter.
Well, other than Laias, there are the children of the desert who would congratulate me on my birthday.
That knucklehead is probably too stupid to know when my birthday is.
As for that annoying fly... I don’t need any gifts from him. I just want him not to appear at all.
Putting that aside, I’m so excited for today! I wonder what kind of present Laias is going to give me today!
Oh, hey Lilia. You're up early. Have you slept well?
Oh, good morning, sis!
Morning! Since today is your birthday, why don't we go out after lunch?
Sure! Sounds good! Let’s go out! Just the two of us!
Sure. Oh, by the way, do you want me to give you the present while lighting the birthday candles after dinner?
No! Now! You can give it to me now! The cake can wait!
Ahaha. Very well then...
Here you go. Happy birthday, Lilia. Thank you for being such a good, healthy sister.
W-wooow... Thank you so much! I’ve always wanted this!
Happy birthday, brat!
What? Just take the present already.
Um... Okay... Thanks, I guess?
Good morning, Neraxis. I’m surprised you remembered her birthday.
Of course I remembered! She’s your sister!
By the way, getting that present was an adventure on its own. That thing was awfully hard to find. But I...
Lilia.
Happy birthday. We hope you have a great birthday today.
Heyyy! Thanks for the present!
This is just a small gift we’ve prepared for you.
And this... is something we were asked to give to you.
W-what... What is this? I, uh... I mean... Sure. I’m impressed that you carried this all the way here with your human body.
With the ability to control desert sands, it is not that challenging.
Aha. So who made- I mean, who asked you to send this to me?
That’s...
...No way.
Yes. The God King, he...
As you already know, tomorrow is that little girl's birthday.
I would like to give her a gift as she’s the sister of Laias,
but we all know that we are not on good terms.
As a king, it would not be appropriate for me to spoil her birthday by traveling to her house.
Then again, as a king, I should also show her my good will. Which is why I need you to be my envoy.
Ah... Ahahaha.....
This is the God King’s gift to you to congratulate your birthday. He appreciates you in his own way, Lilia.
Please accept his good will...
No!
Never!
Not in a million years!
But on the other hand, if I don't receive it, you will be in trouble, so I have to!
Oh my... Is that your statue? It’s so big. It’s really nice-looking as well!
Is this one of the gifts for you?
Um... Yep. That annoying fl- I mean, Cain’s gift.
I see! How are you liking it? You've never received a gift like this before.
Ah... Ahaha... It’s, uh...
(How do I say that it's too much when they're all smiling like that?!)
I-uh... I like it! It's quite... uh... amusing!
Then let’s put this near the entrance. Sorry, but could you help us out one more time, Zafir?
Ah... No... That knucklehead is going to make fun of-
Ahahaha! Hey, brat! What is this thing?! Ahahahahahaha!
Nooooooo...
The spirits are telling me that they are feeling the energy of birth.
Uncle Oddy, could it be that it’s your birthday?
Hm... Birthday...
Uncle Oddy’s birthday is next month. Rephy has to wait.
How about you? When is your birthday, Uncle Nyx?
Birthday... That word brings back some memories.
I didn't really think about it for a while... But come to think of it, I think it's today.
The spirits were correct! They inform Rephy so many things!
What?!
Why have you not told me something that important!
I thought we were close friends! Was it just my imagination?!
Hahaha... Take it easy, friend. You don't have to get so angry.
It’s just that I don't really think of my birthday as something to remember.
It's not because I don't think of you as a friend. Obviously, you're one of my closest friends.
Hmph! You wait here and don’t move an inch.
We are going to make your birthday something you will never forget!
Rephy! Let’s go and prepare for the celebration.
Birthday parties are always so exciting!
Uncle Nyx must get excited for it too! We are going to prepare something amazing for you!
Let’s see what they prepare.
Haha, I suppose I could just wait for them as they prepare for my birthday celebration...
BAM! POW! (1st Attempt)
Rephy! Two more sacks of sugar!
Okay, Uncle Oddy!
Spirits, help Rephy!
*Explodes*
Hmm.. That didn't work. Let's try again, Rephy.
Okay!
BOOM! POW! (4th Attempt)
Rephy! Three bottles of milk!
Okay, Uncle Oddy!
Time Fragments!!
*Explodes*
Hmm.. That didn't work. Again!
Okay!
BOOM! POW! (13th Attempt)
Salvation!!
Time Distortion!!
Rephy!
Uncle Oddy!
BUMP!
We’ve kept you waiting long enough, friend!
Uncle Nyx! We are here!
This is the birthday present we’ve prepared.
Ta-da!!
Happy birthday, Uncle Nyx!
Happy birthday, friend!
Thank you very much, friend! Thank you as well, little furry friend.
Unfortunately, my birthday ends in 2 minutes though.
Oh no!!!
Hahahaha.
In that case, I have no choice but to use this as a last resort! Time Distortion! Max charge!
I've used all the time particles I gathered over the past decade to make time around us go as slow as possible!
This will buy us about 10 minutes! I think.
Uncle Oddy! You are amazing! Happy birthday again, Uncle Nyx!
Huff... Huff... Happy birthday for real this time, friend!
Hahaha... This really is an unforgettable gift.
Alright then, let’s cut the cake now, shall we!
Finale!
*Sigh*
Is everything alright, Aselica?
I am alright. Let’s continue with the training.
No, this will do. We should end our training for today.
If I remember correctly, today is the day you awakened.
You are correct. What about it?
Humans call the day they were born, a birthday.
Apparently, it is a day when everyone gathers around and celebrates one's birth.
...The cycle of life and death that humans go through carries no meaning for us.
We were made to realize Lua’s will, and that is our sole purpose.
Indeed. We were made and awakened for that purpose.
However... you must know this too, don’t you?
We can never possess power stronger than the power Lua granted us.
Further training will only drain our strength.
I believe taking a rest to preserve our strengths for the battle in the future is also something we can do for our Goddess.
I see... understood.
(Birthday...)
(Now that I recall, I remember hearing about this before.)
Did you know that humans call the day they were born a birthday?
For you, Aselica, since today is the day you awakened, you can call this day your birthday.
Happy birthday, Aselica!
Ha...
(It was such a long time ago that I forgot about it.)
(I told her that for Angels, birthdays are meaningless.)
(However, she insisted to sing me a song to celebrate my birthday.)
(Yes, just like this...)
What the?
Lalala!
*Sigh* this doesn't feel right.
The chord should be correct, but... What could be the issue here?
...Your pitch is flat by one semitone.
I believe you're having that problem because tuning is different for instruments used by Angels.
Hmm? Kyah!!
Y-you are?
My apologies for surprising you. I am Aselica, the Guardian Knight of the Angels.
The sound of a familiar tune drew me here.
That song... Where did you hear that from?
I... I learned it from my friend who serves Lua.
My friend told me that it's a song from a hundred years ago, the time when the Dark Lord Angmund resurrected.
Apparently, a nameless priest from the Church of Lua sang this song to those who were suffering at that time.
A nameless priest...
Some people say that it was actually a benevolent Angel who pitied the humans.
An Angel sang a hymn for the humans?
That cannot be true.
Angels only act for the Goddess and nothing else.
Oh, is that right?
Well... A myth is a myth after all.
Perhaps someone mistook her as an angel.
Of course. There’s no way an angel like that would exi-
Um... Are you alright?
Ah, yes... It’s nothing.
I actually have a request for you. Would you sing me that song you just sang?
It’s a song which my precious friend sang to me
a long ago on my 'birthday,' as humans would describe it.
Of course. I was practicing it anyway.
(Ah... What a beautiful voice...)
(Emotions make us weak, and stray us from the path of Goddess Lua.)
(That is why I suppressed my emotions, setting self-control as a virtue.)
(But this... warmth that spreads throughout my heart... What is this feeling?)
